titan_pylib.data_structures.wavelet_matrix.dynamic_wavelet_matrix のソースコード

 1from titan_pylib.data_structures.bit_vector.avltree_bit_vector import AVLTreeBitVector
 2from titan_pylib.data_structures.wavelet_matrix.wavelet_matrix import WaveletMatrix
 3from typing import Sequence, List
 4from array import array
 5


[ドキュメント]
 6class DynamicWaveletMatrix(WaveletMatrix):
 7
 8  def __init__(self, sigma: int, a: Sequence[int]=[]):
 9    self.sigma: int = sigma
10    self.log: int = (sigma-1).bit_length()
11    self.v: List[AVLTreeBitVector] = [AVLTreeBitVector()] * self.log
12    self.mid: array[int] = array('I', bytes(4*self.log))
13    self.size: int = len(a)
14    self._build(a)
15
16  def _build(self, a: Sequence[int]) -> None:
17    v = array('B', bytes(self.size))
18    for bit in range(self.log-1, -1, -1):
19      # bit目の0/1に応じてvを構築 + aを安定ソート
20      zero, one = [], []
21      for i, e in enumerate(a):
22        if e >> bit & 1:
23          v[i] = 1
24          one.append(e)
25        else:
26          v[i] = 0
27          zero.append(e)
28      self.mid[bit] = len(zero)  # 境界をmid[bit]に保持
29      self.v[bit] = AVLTreeBitVector(v)
30      a = zero + one
31


[ドキュメント]
32  def reserve(self, n: int) -> None:
33    assert n >= 0, f'ValueError: {self.__class__.__name__}.reserve({n})'
34    for v in self.v:
35      v.reserve(n)


36


[ドキュメント]
37  def insert(self, k: int, x: int) -> None:
38    assert 0 <= k <= self.size, f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}.insert({k}, {x}), n={self.size}'
39    assert 0 <= x < 1<<self.log, f'ValueError: {self.__class__.__name__}.insert({k}, {x}), LIM={1<<self.log}'
40    mid = self.mid
41    for bit in range(self.log-1, -1, -1):
42      v = self.v[bit]
43      # if x >> bit & 1:
44      #   v.insert(k, 1)
45      #   k = v.rank1(k) + mid[bit]
46      # else:
47      #   v.insert(k, 0)
48      #   mid[bit] += 1
49      #   k = v.rank0(k)
50      if x >> bit & 1:
51        s = v._insert_and_rank1(k, 1)
52        k = s + mid[bit]
53      else:
54        s = v._insert_and_rank1(k, 0)
55        k -= s
56        mid[bit] += 1
57    self.size += 1


58


[ドキュメント]
59  def pop(self, k: int) -> int:
60    assert 0 <= k < self.size, f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}.pop({k}), n={self.size}'
61    mid = self.mid
62    ans = 0
63    for bit in range(self.log-1, -1, -1):
64      v = self.v[bit]
65      # K = k
66      # if v.access(k):
67      #   ans |= 1 << bit
68      #   k = v.rank1(k) + mid[bit]
69      # else:
70      #   mid[bit] -= 1
71      #   k = v.rank0(k)
72      # v.pop(K)
73      sb = v._access_pop_and_rank1(k)
74      s = sb >> 1
75      if sb & 1:
76        ans |= 1 << bit
77        k = s + mid[bit]
78      else:
79        mid[bit] -= 1
80        k -= s
81    self.size -= 1
82    return ans


83


[ドキュメント]
84  def update(self, k: int, x: int) -> None:
85    assert 0 <= k < self.size, f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}.update({k}, {x}), n={self.size}'
86    assert 0 <= x < 1<<self.log, f'ValueError: {self.__class__.__name__}.update({k}, {x}), LIM={1<<self.log}'
87    self.pop(k)
88    self.insert(k, x)


89
90  def __setitem__(self, k: int, x: int):
91    assert 0 <= k < self.size, f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}[{k}] = {x}, n={self.size}'
92    assert 0 <= x < 1<<self.log, f'ValueError: {self.__class__.__name__}[{k}] = {x}, LIM={1<<self.log}'
93    self.update(k, x)
94
95  def __str__(self):
96    return f'{self.__class__.__name__}({[self[i] for i in range(self.size)]})'
